name: Rabbit of Destiny
description: The brave little rabbit decided to save the forest and its inhabitants. Equipped with a dagger and a pistol, he went to the edge of the forest where green goo spills out of broken barrels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Core 2 duo 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible or better video card Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible sound cards windows 7/8/10
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Quad-core 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible or better video card Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible sound cards windows 7/8/10
